verses.verse: אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then יָשִֽׁיר־ <S%H7891><s%> Then sang מֹשֶׁה֩ <S%H4872><s%> Moses וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשִּׁירָ֤ה <S%H7892><s%> this song הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> and spake לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אָשִׁ֤ירָה <S%H7891><s%> I will sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָאֹ֣ה <S%H1342><s%> for he hath triumphed גָּאָ֔ה <S%H1342><s%> gloriously ס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> the horse וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <S%H7392><s%> and his rider רָמָ֥ה <S%H7411><s%> hath he thrown בַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> into the sea

עָזִּ֤י <S%H5797><s%> [is] my strength וְזִמְרָת֙ <S%H2176><s%> and song יָ֔הּ <S%H3050><s%> The LORD וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> has become לִ֖י לִֽישׁוּעָ֑ה <S%H3444><s%> and he is become my salvation זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> he אֵלִי֙ <S%H410><s%> [is] my God וְאַנְוֵ֔הוּ <S%H5115><s%> and I will prepare him an habitation אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> my father's וַאֲרֹמְמֶֽנְהוּ׃ <S%H7311><s%> and I will exalt
יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [is] a man מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> of war יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name

מַרְכְּבֹ֥ת <S%H4818><s%> chariots פַּרְעֹ֛ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh's וְחֵיל֖וֹ <S%H2426><s%> army יָרָ֣ה <S%H3384><s%> hath he cast בַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> into the sea וּמִבְחַ֥ר <S%H4005><s%> his chosen שָֽׁלִשָׁ֖יו <S%H7991><s%> captains טֻבְּע֥וּ <S%H2883><s%> also are drowned בְיַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea סֽוּף׃ <S%H5488><s%> in the Red

תְּהֹמֹ֖ת <S%H8415><s%> The depths יְכַסְיֻ֑מוּ <S%H3680><s%> have covered יָרְד֥וּ <S%H3381><s%> them they sank בִמְצוֹלֹ֖ת <S%H4688><s%> into the bottom כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> as אָֽבֶן׃ <S%H68><s%> a stone

יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <S%H3225><s%> Thy right hand יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD נֶאְדָּרִ֖י <S%H142><s%> is become glorious בַּכֹּ֑חַ <S%H3581><s%> in power יְמִֽינְךָ֥ <S%H3225><s%> thy right hand יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD תִּרְעַ֥ץ <S%H7492><s%> hath dashed in pieces אוֹיֵֽב׃ <S%H341><s%> the enemy

וּבְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> And in the greatness גְּאוֹנְךָ֖ <S%H1347><s%> of thine excellency תַּהֲרֹ֣ס <S%H2040><s%> thou hast overthrown קָמֶ֑יךָ <S%H6965><s%> them that rose up against תְּשַׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> thee thou sentest forth חֲרֹ֣נְךָ֔ <S%H2740><s%> thy wrath יֹאכְלֵ֖מוֹ <S%H398><s%> [which] consumed כַּקַּֽשׁ׃ <S%H7179><s%> them as stubble

וּבְר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> And with the blast אַפֶּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H639><s%> of thy nostrils נֶ֣עֶרְמוּ <S%H6192><s%> were gathered together מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters נִצְּב֥וּ <S%H5324><s%> stood upright כְמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like נֵ֖ד <S%H5067><s%> as an heap נֹזְלִ֑ים <S%H5140><s%> the floods קָֽפְא֥וּ <S%H7087><s%> were congealed תְהֹמֹ֖ת <S%H8415><s%> [and] the depths בְּלֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> in the heart יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea

אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> said אוֹיֵ֛ב <S%H341><s%> The enemy אֶרְדֹּ֥ף <S%H7291><s%> I will pursue אַשִּׂ֖יג <S%H5381><s%> I will overtake אֲחַלֵּ֣ק <S%H2505><s%> I will divide שָׁלָ֑ל <S%H7998><s%> the spoil תִּמְלָאֵ֣מוֹ <S%H4390><s%> shall be satisfied נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> my lust אָרִ֣יק <S%H7324><s%> upon them I will draw חַרְבִּ֔י <S%H2719><s%> my sword תּוֹרִישֵׁ֖מוֹ <S%H3423><s%> shall destroy יָדִֽי׃ <S%H3027><s%> my hand

נָשַׁ֥פְתָּ <S%H5398><s%> Thou didst blow בְרוּחֲךָ֖ <S%H7307><s%> with thy wind כִּסָּ֣מוֹ <S%H3680><s%> covered יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea צָֽלֲלוּ֙ <S%H6749><s%> them they sank כַּֽעוֹפֶ֔רֶת <S%H5777><s%> as lead בְּמַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters אַדִּירִֽים׃ <S%H117><s%> in the mighty

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who כָמֹ֤כָה <S%H3644><s%> is like בָּֽאֵלִם֙ <S%H410><s%> the gods יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Who [is] like unto thee O LORD מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who כָּמֹ֖כָה <S%H3644><s%> is like נֶאְדָּ֣ר <S%H142><s%> majestic בַּקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in holiness נוֹרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> fearful תְהִלֹּ֖ת <S%H8416><s%> [in] praises עֹ֥שֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> doing פֶֽלֶא׃ <S%H6382><s%> marvellous thing
נָטִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H5186><s%> Thou stretchedst out יְמִ֣ינְךָ֔ <S%H3225><s%> thy right hand תִּבְלָעֵ֖מוֹ <S%H1104><s%> swallowed אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

נָחִ֥יתָ <S%H5148><s%> hast led forth בְחַסְדְּךָ֖ <S%H2617><s%> Thou in thy mercy עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> the people ז֣וּ <S%H2098><s%> [which] גָּאָ֑לְתָּ <S%H1350><s%> thou hast redeemed נֵהַ֥לְתָּ <S%H5095><s%> thou hast guided בְעָזְּךָ֖ <S%H5797><s%> [them] in thy strength אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about נְוֵ֥ה <S%H5116><s%> habitation קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H6944><s%> unto thy holy

שָֽׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> shall hear עַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> The people יִרְגָּז֑וּן <S%H7264><s%> [and] be afraid חִ֣יל <S%H2427><s%> sorrow אָחַ֔ז <S%H270><s%> shall take hold יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> on the inhabitants פְּלָֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H6429><s%> of Palestina

אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> Then נִבְהֲלוּ֙ <S%H926><s%> shall be amazed אַלּוּפֵ֣י <S%H441><s%> the dukes אֱד֔וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom אֵילֵ֣י <S%H352><s%> the mighty men מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab יֹֽאחֲזֵ֖מוֹ <S%H270><s%> shall take hold רָ֑עַד <S%H7461><s%> trembling נָמֹ֕גוּ <S%H4127><s%> shall melt away כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> All יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> upon them all the inhabitants כְנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan

תִּפֹּ֨ל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall עֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> and אֵימָ֙תָה֙ <S%H367><s%> Fear וָפַ֔חַד <S%H6343><s%> and dread בִּגְדֹ֥ל <S%H1419><s%> upon them by the greatness זְרוֹעֲךָ֖ <S%H2220><s%> of thine arm יִדְּמ֣וּ <S%H1826><s%> they shall be [as] still כָּאָ֑בֶן <S%H68><s%> as a stone עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until יַעֲבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> pass over עַמְּךָ֙ <S%H5971><s%> till thy people יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD עַֽד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until יַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> pass over עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> till the people ז֥וּ <S%H2098><s%> [which] קָנִֽיתָ׃ <S%H7069><s%> thou hast purchased

תְּבִאֵ֗מוֹ <S%H935><s%> Thou shalt bring וְתִטָּעֵ֙מוֹ֙ <S%H5193><s%> them in and plant בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> them in the mountain נַחֲלָֽתְךָ֔ <S%H5159><s%> of thine inheritance מָכ֧וֹן <S%H4349><s%> [in] the place לְשִׁבְתְּךָ֛ <S%H3427><s%> for thee to dwell in פָּעַ֖לְתָּ <S%H6466><s%> [which] thou hast made יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD מִקְּדָ֕שׁ <S%H4720><s%> [in] the Sanctuary אֲדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> O Lord כּוֹנְנ֥וּ <S%H3559><s%> have established יָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> [which] thy hands
יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יִמְלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign לְעֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בָא֩ <S%H935><s%> went in ס֨וּס <S%H5483><s%> For the horse פַּרְעֹ֜ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh בְּרִכְבּ֤וֹ <S%H7393><s%> with his chariots וּבְפָרָשָׁיו֙ <S%H6571><s%> and with his horsemen בַּיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> into the sea וַיָּ֧שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> brought again יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD עֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> the waters הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וּבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> upon them but the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הָלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> went בַיַּבָּשָׁ֖ה <S%H3004><s%> on dry בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [land] in the midst הַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea פ

וַתִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> took מִרְיָ֨ם <S%H4813><s%> And Miriam הַנְּבִיאָ֜ה <S%H5031><s%> the prophetess אֲח֧וֹת <S%H269><s%> the sister אַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתֹּ֖ף <S%H8596><s%> a timbrel בְּיָדָ֑הּ <S%H3027><s%> in her hand וַתֵּצֶ֤אןָ <S%H3318><s%> went out כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַנָּשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> and all the women אַחֲרֶ֔יהָ <S%H310><s%> after בְּתֻפִּ֖ים <S%H8596><s%> her with timbrels וּבִמְחֹלֹֽת׃ <S%H4246><s%> and with dances

וַתַּ֥עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered לָהֶ֖ם מִרְיָ֑ם <S%H4813><s%> And Miriam שִׁ֤ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> them Sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> ye to the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָאֹ֣ה <S%H1342><s%> for he hath triumphed גָּאָ֔ה <S%H1342><s%> gloriously ס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> the horse וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <S%H7392><s%> and his rider רָמָ֥ה <S%H7411><s%> hath he thrown בַיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> into the sea ס

וַיַּסַּ֨ע <S%H5265><s%> brought מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> So Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִיַּם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea ס֔וּף <S%H5488><s%> from the Red וַיֵּצְא֖וּ <S%H3318><s%> and they went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness שׁ֑וּר <S%H7793><s%> of Shur וַיֵּלְכ֧וּ <S%H1980><s%> went שְׁלֹֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7969><s%> three יָמִ֛ים <S%H3117><s%> days בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no מָ֥צְאוּ <S%H4672><s%> and found מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> no water

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> And when they came מָרָ֔תָה <S%H4785><s%> to Marah וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יָֽכְל֗וּ <S%H3201><s%> they could לִשְׁתֹּ֥ת <S%H8354><s%> not drink מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> of the waters מִמָּרָ֔ה <S%H4785><s%> of Marah כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מָרִ֖ים <S%H4751><s%> for they [were] bitter הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> of it was קָרָֽא־ <S%H7121><s%> of it was called שְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> therefore the name מָרָֽה׃ <S%H4785><s%> Marah

וַיִּלֹּ֧נוּ <S%H3885><s%> murmured הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> against Moses לֵּאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נִּשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <S%H8354><s%> What shall we drink

וַיִּצְעַ֣ק <S%H6817><s%> And he cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיּוֹרֵ֤הוּ <S%H3384><s%> shewed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD עֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> him a tree וַיַּשְׁלֵךְ֙ <S%H7993><s%> [which] when he had cast אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> into the waters וַֽיִּמְתְּק֖וּ <S%H4985><s%> were made sweet הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> There שָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> there he made ל֛וֹ חֹ֥ק <S%H2706><s%> for them a statute וּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> and an ordinance וְשָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> and there נִסָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H5254><s%> and there he proved

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> And said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If שָׁמ֨וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> If thou wilt diligently תִּשְׁמַ֜ע <S%H8085><s%> hearken לְק֣וֹל ׀ <S%H6963><s%> to the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְהַיָּשָׁ֤ר <S%H3477><s%> that which is right בְּעֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> in his sight תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> and wilt do וְהַֽאֲזַנְתָּ֙ <S%H238><s%> and wilt give ear לְמִצְוֹתָ֔יו <S%H4687><s%> to his commandments וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H8104><s%> and keep כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֻקָּ֑יו <S%H2706><s%> all his statutes כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמַּֽחֲלָ֞ה <S%H4245><s%> none of these diseases אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שַׂ֤מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> I will put בְמִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> upon thee which I have brought עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for I [am] the LORD רֹפְאֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7495><s%> that healeth ס

וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came אֵילִ֔מָה <S%H362><s%> to Elim וְשָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> where שְׁתֵּ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֛ה <S%H6240><s%> ten עֵינֹ֥ת <S%H5869><s%> wells מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water וְשִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> and threescore and ten תְּמָרִ֑ים <S%H8558><s%> palm trees וַיַּחֲנוּ־ <S%H2583><s%> and they encamped שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> there by the waters
